@description.name: @description
@description.body: A decorator is responsible for computing a widget's decoration styles.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the configured padding minus the border width.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} Map of top, right, bottom and left padding values
@return.description: Map of top, right, bottom and left padding values

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the amount of space the decoration needs for its border and padding on each side.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} the desired inset as a map with the keys top, right, bottom, left.
@return.description: the desired inset as a map with the keys top, right, bottom, left.
